A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not as good\, as I thought. A lot of question unanswered and wont be answered.  Do not know where this movie will lead to\, there is no cliffhanger. A lot of similarities to Empire Strikes Back and Return of the Jedi. A whole sub plot did not even need to be in the movie\, nothing came of it.  Overall\, this movie is not what fans were hoping for.
